Tax News

US tax return Japanese translation service

  • Date Posted: 1/3/2020
  • Author: Robert Han

Thank you very much for your special praise.

This time, we have received hot requests from many clients, and we have provided Japanese translation services for various tax returns (Form 1120, Form 1120-F, Form 1040, Form 1040NR, Form 1165, etc.) in the United States. Has started.

Prices start at $ 30 per piece, depending on volume.

First of all, please fill in the following form and apply. Once confirmed, we will contact you shortly.
